Goodbye mess. Hello clean & healthy juice.

I'm ready Show me more

From farm to desk — Without the prep

We are Spins, your new choice for healthy. We understand that you are always busy.
No time for shopping, chopping, and washing. So let us take care of that, we are really good at it.

Open 365 days a year

Never start your day on an empty stomach! Our subscription plans include up to 365 days/year coverage. You can also choose to order more flexibly, if that is your style.

Ready in 15 minutes

You are only 15 minutes away from your favorite fruits and vegetables blended to your style. We work only with the freshest ingredients, fresh is our secret recipe!

100% organic

We cut the middleman out. So that you, can enjoy the freshest products at the lowest price, and we can help our local farmers. Good for your health and the environment. Good tastes better!

Order anything

We don't limit your creativity, which means that you can order whatever you wish to SPIN! If you are feeling adventurous, you can also choose from our Surprise Me! option, just make sure that you double check your allergy list.

How it works — Simple as 1, 2, 3

1

Choose the subscription that best fits your needs and sign up today.

2

Order your choice of juice using our mobile app or website. Or feel free to call us!

3

Enjoy your juice in 15 minutes. Delivered or pick up
